CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1951, pg. 3, reads: "First Members - James Jordan, left, and Paul C. Pollard became the first Negro members of the Junior Chamber of Commerce at orientation exercises held last Thursday evening. They were sponsored by Atty. Emerson C. Hess Jr.  Mr. Jordan, a Frontiersman, is president of the Jordan Supply Company.  Mr. Pollard is an internal revenue agent. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Paul C. Pollard seated in plastic covered armchair, with Paul Pollard Jr. and Gail Pollard (Jackson) in background, in living room with television set
